document.full_text: derrick rose scored 11 points in the fourth quarter as chicago beat atlanta in game 5 of the eastern conference semifinals on tuesday night to take a 3-2 lead.
document.title: bulls 95, hawks 83: rose leads bulls past hawks
lines_and_colors: derrick rose scored 11 points in the fourth quarter as chicago beat atlanta in game 5 of the eastern conference semifinals on tuesday night to take a 3-2 lead.
